ModulePrefs.title: 2008 Election Results from Google
ModulePrefs.description: View live election results for the 2008 US General Election.
ModulePrefs.author: Google, Inc.

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://maps.google.com/maps?file=api&v=2&key=ABQIAAAAL7MXzZBubnPtVtBszDCxeRTZqGWfQErE9pT-IucjscazSdFnjBSzjqfxm1CQj7RDgG-OoyNfebJK0w">
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.2.6/jquery.min.js">
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
	
	GoogleElectionMapOptions = {
		tpm: true,
		_: null
	};
	
	function script( url, seconds ) {
		document.write(
			'<script type="text/javascript" src="',
				_IG_GetCachedUrl( url, { refreshInterval:seconds } ),
			'">',
			'<\/script>'
		);
	}
	
	script( 'http://general-election-2008.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/polygonzo.js', 60 );
	script( 'http://general-election-2008.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/results-map.js', 60 );
</script>
